data.name: Sound FX: Silentscapes
data.detailed_description:
SILENTSCAPES is a collection high quality recorded and fully mastered room tones, ambiences and background sounds. The sound library contains both indoor and outdoor sounds and the sound editing was done to obtain constant and quiet ambiences.

All sounds can be used as the first and neutral sounding layer of your projects, to give support and consistency to dialogue and sfx tracks. Otherwise they can be used as sound sweeteners for existing background ambiences or sound sources for new sound shaping. Includes 36 sounds that are the perfect companion for SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.

data.short_description: SILENTSCAPES is a collection high quality recorded and fully mastered room tones, ambiences and background sounds. The sound library contains both indoor and outdoor sounds and the sound editing was done to obtain constant and quiet ambiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1 or Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080 recommended)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Connection required for downloads

data.legal_notice:
*Cakewalk Loop Manager is designed and tested to be compatible with STEAM installations of Music Creator and SONAR. Other SONAR or Music Creator configurations/installations are not officially supported.
**Cakewalk Loop Manager should be installed to the same STEAM Library that you have Music Creator and/or SONAR installed to for proper operation.
***Cakewalk Loop Manager does not need Music Creator or SONAR installed to be utilized.
